description: The petition to stop work so alternatives can be considered succeeded by one vote.
title: Work stops on Guernsey 'one school, two sites' model
title_page: Work stops on Guernsey 'one school, two sites' model - BBC News
maintext: The requete, which was amended to include an exclusion of selection in the review of alternative models, was approved by 18 votes to 17 by States members after four days of debate.
